message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to start.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling more generous than 60/40, but the clock is ticking for both of us.
Bob, time is money!  I'll be generous and take a little less than last time, but let's close this deal.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer before inflation eats away any potential gains for both of us!
